description: After months of often tortuous and circular negotiations over an EU-UK trade deal, could this be it?
title: Talk of Brexit deal breakthrough: Handle with care
title_page: Talk of Brexit deal breakthrough: Handle with care - BBC News
maintext: To be clear: in these last hours and days of talks, the choice facing the government is not between either a hard or a soft Brexit. That ship has already sailed. The UK is leaving the EU's customs union and single market. The government's choice now is between a hard Brexit with a deal, or no deal with the EU at all.
